line_1: Perhaps at will th' untutor'd Savage rov'd,
line_2: He fed, and slept beneath the shade he lov'd.

line_1: To shun the god the silvan scene she roved;
line_2: No vain delight her modest virtue proved

line_1: I ne'er for guilty, painful pleasures rov'd,
line_2: From all the hamlet cull'd whom best I lov'd,

line_1: From Fair to Fair the gay Philander rov'd,
line_2: Sigh'd without Cause, and for a Moment lov'd;

line_1: I ne'er for guilty painful pleasures rov'd;
line_2: From all the hamlet cull'd whom best I lov'd,
